metadata.title: CVE-2023-23559 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In rndis_query_oid in drivers/net/wireless/rndis_wlan.c in the Linux kernelthrough 6.1.5, there is an integer overflow in an addition.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-23559` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1062-dell300x - 4.15.0-1062.67
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1129-raspi2 - 4.15.0-1129.137
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1148-snapdragon - 4.15.0-1148.158
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in bionic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-208.220').
linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'replaced by linux-hwe-5.4').
